content.raw:
@hsu , when i source the gazebo setup file first, i still get the boost mutex error, as well as the world file error.  It also now complains about the controller spawner:

```
[INFO] [WallTime: 1423610837.102679] [0.000000] Loading model xml from ros parameter
[INFO] [WallTime: 1423610837.112095] [0.000000] Waiting for service /gazebo/spawn_urdf_model
[INFO] [WallTime: 1423610837.142779] [0.000000] Controller Spawner: Waiting for service controller_manager/load_controller
gzserver: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/recursive_mutex.hpp:101: boost::recursive_mutex::~recursive_mutex(): Assertion `!pthread_mutex_destroy(&m)' failed.
/home/swhart/ros/catkin_workspace/src/nasa_r2_common/r2_control/nodes/r2_ready_pose.py:38: SyntaxWarning: The publisher should be created with an explicit keyword argument 'queue_size'. Please see http://wiki.ros.org/rospy/Overview/Publishers%20and%20Subscribers for more information.
  self.trajPublisher = rospy.Publisher('/r2/l_arm_controller/command', JointTrajectory)
Aborted (core dumped)
[gazebo-2] process has died [pid 2943, exit code 134, cmd /opt/ros/indigo/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver /home/swhart/ros/catkin_workspace/src/nasa_r2_simulator/r2_gazebo/gazebo/r2_empty.world __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/swhart/.ros/log/58c5ac44-b17c-11e4-89ad-f0761c1354e1/gazebo-2.log].
log file: /home/swhart/.ros/log/58c5ac44-b17c-11e4-89ad-f0761c1354e1/gazebo-2*.log

[WARN] [WallTime: 1423610867.387117] [0.000000] Controller Spawner couldn't find the expected controller_manager ROS interface.
[r2/controller_spawner-4] process has finished cleanly
log file: /home/swhart/.ros/log/58c5ac44-b17c-11e4-89ad-f0761c1354e1/r2-controller_spawner-4*.log
```
content.html:
@hsu , when i source the gazebo setup file first, i still get the boost mutex error, as well as the world file error. It also now complains about the controller spawner:

[INFO] [WallTime: 1423610837.102679] [0.000000] Loading model xml from ros parameter
[INFO] [WallTime: 1423610837.112095] [0.000000] Waiting for service /gazebo/spawn_urdf_model

gzserver: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/recursive_mutex.hpp:101: boost::recursive_mutex::~recursive_mutex(): Assertion `!pthread_mutex_destroy(&m)' failed.
/home/swhart/ros/catkin_workspace/src/nasa_r2_common/r2_control/nodes/r2_ready_pose.py:38: SyntaxWarning: The publisher should be created with an explicit keyword argument 'queue_size'. Please see http://wiki.ros.org/rospy/Overview/Publishers%20and%20Subscribers for more information.
  self.trajPublisher = rospy.Publisher('/r2/l_arm_controller/command', JointTrajectory)
Aborted (core dumped)
[gazebo-2] process has died [pid 2943, exit code 134, cmd /opt/ros/indigo/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver /home/swhart/ros/catkin_workspace/src/nasa_r2_simulator/r2_gazebo/gazebo/r2_empty.world __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/swhart/.ros/log/58c5ac44-b17c-11e4-89ad-f0761c1354e1/gazebo-2.log].
